settings.heading: We’re here to help
settings.text:
At Swiss Time Co., we are delighted to assist you. Whether you have a question about a specific timepiece, need help with your order, or simply want expert advice, our team is here to help.

We believe that exceptional service should match the timeless elegance of our luxury watches. Don’t hesitate to reach out, we’re always happy to hear from you.

Phone

+41 (800) 123-4567

Available Monday–Friday, 10:00–17:00

Email

info@swisstimeco.ch

We aim to respond within 24 hours.

Get in Touch

Use the form below to send us a message, and one of our watch specialists will get back to you promptly.

settings.rich_text:
We prioritize customer service

Swiss Time Co understand the high expectations of watch enthusiasts and are committed to delivering exceptional service in every interaction and through service

Explore our huge selection online

Featuring exclusively sourced timepieces from around the world, Swiss Time Co offers unique models, both discontinued and new Authorized watches

Most competitive prices

We proudly offer some of Switzerland’s most competitive luxury watch prices, combining trusted partnerships with a commitment to value, quality, and service
